title: Divya Haaram with Emerald Accents and Pearl Drops
materials: Emeralds (4.79 carats) and Rubies (6.02 carats) with Freshwater Pearls (53.90 carats)
features: Elaborate floral and paisley design, diamond-studded with strategic placement of Emeralds, with pearl droplets. Features an exquisitely crafted detachable pendant with similar design motifs. Intricate diamond setting ensures maximum brilliance and fire.
colors: and Creamy White (Pearls). A classic South Indian color palette.
occasions: or significant celebrations. Suitable for brides and women who love traditional South Indian jewellery.
description: A regal and timeless piece that exudes grace and sophistication. The combination of Diamonds, Emeralds, Rubies and Pearls makes it a valuable investment. The pendant can be detached and worn separately. High quality craftsmanship ensures longevity and lasting beauty. A treasured heirloom for generations to come.
